Now that we have started our marketing efforts, we expect it slowly increase in numbers.

Author: Emissary Guild
Title: [ANN] OUNA - The Innovative Employee Assessment and Recruitment Platform
Body: OUNA The innovative employee assessment and recruitment platform based on the decentralized blockchain technology   Website | Whitepaper | Telegram | LinkedIn | Medium | Facebook | Twitter | Reddit | Bounty Program  OUNA will be the first-of-its-kind blockchain-based, peer-to-peer HR assessment and recruitment ecosystem. The core of the OUNA platform is based on a novel algorithm, referenced as the ?Analyzer?. The Analyzer is an online Pyramidal Assessment tool that is based on 15 years of research and tested in more than 100 real-life case studies.  OUNA's objective is to place the right person in the right place at the right time - to establish the right fit between the job and the individual, thus maximizing the potential of both the employee and the employer for the long term.  Achieving this objective will help to address the main problems of the recruiting industry:  1. Reducing the cost of acquiring team members.  2. Increasing the success rate of the recruitment process, leading to:  ▪ Improved worker retention ▪ Increased diversity within the workforce ▪ Long-term reduction in recruitment costs ▪ Increased retention of institutional knowledge ▪ Higher engagement ▪ Stronger culture ▪ Greater team cohesion  Roadmap  Phase 1: Blockchain decentralization and improvement of the OUNA application. Beginning of the soft marketing initiative. Phase 2: Development of the API system for existing HR companies and requesters. Increase in the intensity of the marketing initiative. Phase 3: Development of a BI machine learning system, collection, analysis. Phase 4: Completion of the roadmap plan, new technologies and integration with additional HR companies.  Our Bounty Program is now live, click HERE to join!  UPDATES!  A new article about meeting the technology that knows HR recruitment better than you ever will Enjoy reading!

Author: Emissary Guild
Title: [ANN] OUNA - The Innovative Employee Assessment and Recruitment Platform
Body: Hey! I think that OUNA is not really about the recruitment itself as much as it's about finding the best match between the employee and the company. They claim that their analyzer tool will be able to make an almost perfect match between the job and the candidate, based on psychological characteristics and motivations.

Author: nhungtruong379
Title: [ANN] OUNA - The Innovative Employee Assessment and Recruitment Platform
Body: OUNA - The innovative employee assessment and recruitment platform — based on the decentralized blockchain technology.  It’s so important in fact, that new technology solutions are appearing on the market to meet this very need. Algorithms like those used by OUNA, for example, have made huge strides in analyzing not only a candidate’s work experience, but also his character and motivations and matching him with just the right opportunity. Sort of crazy huh? Definitely not how the Mongols recruiting for their hordes of horsemen, but it is the world of tomorrow and promises to result in happy employees of productive companies.

Author: Emissary Guild
Title: [ANN] OUNA - The Innovative Employee Assessment and Recruitment Platform
Body: Hello again ajhon3319  Let me quote OUNA's Whitepaper:  "The OUNA platform will employ autonomous smart contracts that will eliminate market intermediaries, such as old-fashioned HR recruitment agencies, and establish a groundbreaking peer-to-peer ecosystem where employees and employers can interact anonymously in a more cost-efficient, and more importantly, a more accurate method of HR hiring, based on OUNA’s proven Analyzer recruitment and assignment algorithm."  In general, using a blockchain can assist eliminating many wasteful 3rd parties from processes which don't really need to have them. In our case, the HR world, this can save tremendous efforts, time and money. Combining this with OUNA's pyramidal "Analyzer" can provide a new recruiting experience like never seen before.  Please feel more than free to raise further questions here. Thank you.
